subject: Skeleton (Sport)
lead_paragraph: The American Noelle Pikus-Pace got her first World Cup win since 2004, beating two German sliders to the gold medal in a skeleton race in Koenigssee, Germany.
snippet: The American Noelle Pikus-Pace got her first World Cup win since 2004, beating two German sliders to the gold medal in a skeleton race in Koenigssee, Germany.
